response.overview: The Feeling Remains is a haunting and profoundly personal documentary that plunges deep into the fractured heart of a family torn apart by trauma. With a blend of 16mm film and evocative home videos, it weaves a delicate yet powerful tapestry of past and present, unraveling the intricate and fragile threads of memory and storytelling.  Through each family memberâ€™s fragmented perspective, it embarks on a relentless search for an elusive truth, navigating the shadowy terrain where reality and recollection blur. The film unveils a poignant meditation on the enduring impact of trauma, the complexities of understanding, and the painful yet necessary journey toward reconciliation with the past.
response.title: The Feeling Remains
